attributes.action: Give local councils not county councils to remove bus companies if they do not perform or deliver proper services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in The fareham Gosport area have to suffer the lack of service from First Bus. They have chopped services, increased the fares to what ammounts to extortion and now don't run services after 8.00pm we would like to choose are bus company at a local level and remove them if they don't provide a good service. I am sure many people feel this way about there services. so lets try to do something about it.
